section.title: Retail Sale
section.para: To edit a pending sale select edit to under Sale tab . The following screen will appear:
When creating a new sale or processing a pending sale, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Each transaction will be assigned a unique ID number.
Specify the type of transaction to you would like to initiate. The options include; Sale, Return or Quote
Indicates whether the cash register terminal is currently opened or closed for business.

section.para: Under Customer tab you can enter customer billing contact info. If your retail operation prefers not to track customer information there is an option to hide the tab within system sales module configuration.

listitem.para: Enter the Customer Number of the Customer whose return you are authorizing. The browse button located to the right of the field leads to a searchable Customers list. You may also access this list using the keyboard shortcut "CTRL + L".

tip.para: A valid Customer Number must be entered in the "Customer #" field before payment can be processed. If no valid Customer Number is entered, you will not be able to tender payment. Additionally, Sales may only be entered for active Customers.

listitem.para: Displays the Customer's name.
Displays the Customer's job title.
Displays the Customer's phone number.
Displays a alternate Customer phone number.
Displays Customer's fax number.
Displays Customer's e-mail address.
The Customer's street Address.
The Customer's city.
The Customer's state.
The Customer's Postal Code.
The Customer's country.

section.para: Fields along the bottom of the page show sale amount details.

listitem.para: Displays the subtotal for the Sale Items
Displays the total amount of Tax to be charged on the Sale. The Tax amount displayed here represents the total for all Item Tax amounts.
Displays the total amount of the Sale.

section.para: At the top of and to the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a new retail sale, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the retail sale and saves the sale information.

section.para: At the top of the Customer tab, the following buttons are available :

listitem.para: Opens screen for creating a new customer.
Enables you to edit selected customer.

section.para: At the bottom of the far right of the screen, the following button is available:

listitem.para: Launches payment screen which allows you to tender payment.

section.para: To add Items to a sale select the Items tab. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Adding Items to a Retail Sale

section.para: When adding or removing items to a Sale, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays Item for this retail sale. A valid customer number must be entered in the "Customer #" field before items can be added to the sale unless system is configured to not require customer information.
Select the quantity of items to be transacted.
Displays list price for one item.
Displays total price for one unit multiplied by the quantity purchased.

section.para: At the middle of the Items tab, the following buttons are available :

listitem.para: Adds additional items to the retail sale.
Removes selected line item from the retail sale.

section.para: To add or review Sale Details select the Details tab. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Adding Details to a Retail Sale

section.para: When adding or reviewing Details of a Sale, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays current date of retail transaction.
Select sales representative who is processing the sale. Sales rep is required to process payment unless
Displays the terminal which sale was processed on.
Displays the site where the sale was processed.
Enter any additional notes related specifically to the sale.

section.para: To tender payment select Payment button. The following screen will appear:
When processing Payment, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: The total amount of sale before taxes.
The amount of retail tax applied to subtotal.
Total based on Subtotal plus Tax.
Amount of cash applied to total.
Select to use credit card as tender of payment.
Amount to be applied to credit card.
Credit Card vendor used.
Credit Card number.
Name of Credit Card holder.
Address of Credit Card holder.
City of residence for Credit Card holder.
State of residence for Credit Card holder.
Postal Code of city for Credit Card holder.
Country of residence of Credit Card holder.
Expiration month of Credit card.
Expiration year of Credit Card.
Card Verification Value, 3 or 4 digit value printed on the card or signature strip, but not encoded on the magnetic stripe.
Select to use check as tender of payment.
Amount of check applied to payment
Check number or drivers license number.
Amount paid.
Balance remaining after amount paid.
Difference if amount paid greater than balance owed.
Select to print customer copy of receipt.

section.para: At the upper right corner of the screen, the following buttons are available :

listitem.para: Select to exit payment screen without saving payment data.
Select to save data and post payment.
